text: Ndipo zavumbulutsidwa kale kwa inu mâ€™Buku kuti pamene inu mukumva chivumbulutso cha Mulungu chili kukanidwa kapena kunyozedwa, inu musakhale pa malo amenewo mpaka pamene ayamba kukamba nkhani zina chifukwa mukakhala nawo, mudzakhala ngati iwo. Ndithudi Mulungu adzasonkhanitsa anthu a chinyengo ndi anthu osakhulupirira ku Gahena
